text: Neomphalus fretterae is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Neomphalidae. This species common name is the Galapagos rift limpetBatten, Roger Lyman: Shell structure of the Galapagos Rift limpet Neomphalus fretterae McLean 1981, with notes on muscle scars and insertions. American Museum Novitates ; no. 2776 http://digitallibrary.amnh.org/dspace/handle/2246/5253 American Museum Novitates; no. 2776, New York, N.Y. : American Museum of Natural History, 1984 ==References== ==External links== * Category:Neomphalidae Category:Gastropods described in 1981
title: Neomphalus fretterae
